title: Derivatives and antiderivatives of basic functions

content.question: Which of the following is an equation of a curve that intersects at right angles every curve of the family <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="y equals 1 divided by x plus k"> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mi>x</mi> </mfrac> <mo>+</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG5bGaeyypa0ZaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaaigdaa8aabaWdbiaadIha aaGaey4kaSIaam4Aaaaa@3BF2@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> (where k takes all real values)?

choices.label: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="y equals negative one third times x cubed "> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>âˆ’</mo><mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG5bGaeyypa0JaeyOeI0YaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaaigdaa8aabaWd biaaiodaaaGaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIZaaaaaaa@3CD3@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="y equals one third times x cubed"> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG5bGaeyypa0ZaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaaigdaa8aabaWdbiaaioda aaGaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIZaaaaaaa@3BE6@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="y equals the natural log of x"> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>ln</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG5bGaeyypa0JaciiBaiaac6gacaWG4baaaa@3AFB@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

content.answer: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="y equals one third times x cubed"> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mn>3</mn> </mfrac> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>3</mn> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG5bGaeyypa0ZaaSaaa8aabaWdbiaaigdaa8aabaWdbiaaioda aaGaamiEa8aadaahaaWcbeqaa8qacaaIZaaaaaaa@3BE6@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
